title: The World Awaits Trump-Putin Summit
description: "Balance of Power: Late Edition" focuses on the intersection of politics and global business. On today's show, Retired US Army General Wesley Clark, Former NATO Supreme Allied Commander Europe, discusses the potential risks that can result from President Trump's and President Putin's meeting. Kitty Richards, Senior Fellow at the Groundwork Collaborative, discusses the US producer price index showing prices climbing the most in three years as President Trump claims inflation is down to a perfect number. (Source: Bloomberg)
